title: "Halodoc uses AI to improve how doctors receive feedback"
excerpt: "Due to Indonesia’s vast size and population, timely and reliable access to healthcare can sometimes be a challenge. Halodoc aims to change that with a mobile first-telemedicine platform that connects Indonesians to doctors and helps them arrange appointments, medicine deliveries and tests. What’s distinctive"
